CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- tidyverse may NOT be available - use base R alternatives if needed.
- Create required directories first: mkdir -p results/01_scopus-selection results/02_coding results/03_analyses
- Check installed packages: Rscript -e "installed.packages()[,'Package']"
- Use base R functions (read.csv, subset, merge, aggregate) if tidyverse unavailable.
- If CRAN install needed: Rscript -e "install.packages('pkg', repos='https://cloud.r-project.org')"
